definition: to warm up/to heat up/hot (of weather)/heat/fervent
to insert/stick in/pierce/to take part in/to interfere/to interpose
to pull up/to pull out/to draw out by suction/to select/to pick/to stand out (above level)/to surpass/to seize

sentences.english: How to enable my kernel to support CPU hotplug?
sentences.chinese: 該怎樣激活我的操作系統內核才能支持CPU熱插拔？

sentences.english: Survivability is provided by redundant hot-swappable power supplies and fans.
sentences.chinese: 通過冗餘的熱插拔電源和風扇提供可用性。

sentences.english: All of the hardware components are hot-swappable.
sentences.chinese: 所有硬件組件都支持熱插拔。

sentences.english: The scripting framework is referred to as hotplug policy agents.
sentences.chinese: 這種腳本的框架就稱爲熱插拔策略代理。

sentences.english: Over Voltage Protection, Short Circuit Protection, Hot-Swappable & Parallel Function.
sentences.chinese: 過壓保護，短路保護，熱插拔和並聯使用功能。

sentences.english: Swappable dual DIP type OPAMP upgrades ultimate digital surround sound.
sentences.chinese: 熱插拔的雙部型運放升級最終數字環繞音效。
